Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to a partial abatement of real property taxes on real property that was rebuilt after being seriously damaged by the severe storm that occurred on the twenty-ninth and thirtieth of October, two thousand twelve in a city having a population of one million or more.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Partial abatement of real property taxes on real property that was rebuilt after being seriously damaged by the severe storm that occurred on the 29th and 30th of October, 2012 in a city having a population of one million or more.

Items.Title: Resolution approving the new designation and changes in the designation of certain organizations to receive funding in the Expense Budget.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: New designation and changes in the designation of certain organizations to receive funding in the Expense Budget.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to a partial abatement of real property taxes on real property that was rebuilt after being seriously damaged by the severe storm that occurred on the twenty-ninth and thirtieth of October, two thousand twelve in a city having a population of one million or more.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be P-C Item Approved by Comm approved by Roll Call.
